name: Rubber Bandits: Summer Prologue
description:
Rubber Bandits: Summer Prologue is a multiplayer brawler for up to 4 players.

Sun, sand between your toes and the joy of beating your friends with dead fish. That is what you get in Rubber Bandits: Summer Prologue.
Grab whatever you can find and use it as a weapon. First to 3 wins takes the prize.

  • Fight free-for-all or team up for a 2v2.
  • No hassle multiplayer - Play online, locally or everyone on one PC.
  • Pick your favorite summer character
  • Beat your friends with anything from water balloons to stranded sharks.

The Summer Prologue gives a taste of what you can expect when the full game Rubber Bandits is released later this year.

If you like what you see please make sure to follow the development on our Discord or other social channels.
